verses.roman:
pratāparudrera haila parama vismaya
dekhite vivaśa rājā haila premamaya

synonyms: pratāparudrera—of King Pratāparudra; haila—there was; parama—very much; vismaya—astonishment; dekhite—to see; vivaśa—inactive; rājā—the King; haila—became; prema-maya—in ecstatic love.
translation: King Pratāparudra also was astonished to see the saṅkīrtana. He became inactive and was converted to ecstatic love of Kṛṣṇa.
